abstract: A collaboration between the Walt Disney Company and the toy maker Techno Source, Clickables are a line of toy jewelry items made to interact with Disney’s Pixie Hollow Web site.
snippet: A collaboration between the Walt Disney Company and the toy maker Techno Source, Clickables are a line of toy jewelry items made to interact with Disney’s Pixie Hollow Web site.
lead_paragraph: Everything these days seems to have some kind of computer chip  car keys, credit cards and now your daughter’s charm bracelet. A collaboration between the Walt Disney Company and the toy maker Techno Source, Clickables are a line of toy jewelry items made to interact with Disney’s Pixie Hollow Web site.

headline.main: A Charm to Take Little Pixies Off the Web and Home to Play
headline.print_headline: A Charm to Take Little Pixies Off the Web and Home to Play
